mapper.select: SELECT mt_idx, mt_name, mt_count, mt_degree FROM cp_member_title ORDER BY mt_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cp_member_title(mt_name, mt_count, mt_degree) VALUES(#{mt_name}, #{mt_count}, #{mt_degree})
mapper.update: UPDATE cp_member_title SET mt_name = #{mt_name}, mt_count = #{mt_count}, mt_degree = #{mt_degree} WHERE mt_idx = #{mt_idx}
